Airbomber: But where do we go?

Arrow: That's up to you, Airbomber, but I w=
ouldn't lie to you.

Train Wreck: Actually, he WOULD lie to you, but I woul=
dn't, and I seen this as well.

Stranato: I didn't see it, but I believe it=
.

Airbomber: But how can that be?

Arrow: Call her.

Airbomber: I tried th=
at.

Arrow: You don't keep track of those kind of things? I'll call her.

A=
rrow calls Armada by commlink.

Arrow: Is there anyone named Infectra there=
?...

g@yahoogroups.com

  OOC: Please add the new Destron base to the events pag=
e, Zardus.  Its in 
  Syria. 

  :::Ramjet/Wheeljack/Vulois/Time Warp::: 

=
  Ramjet: The one extremely close to us belongs to the Trainers.  They are =
led 
  by a bot named Prebon.  They are powerful, and are enemies of the Ma=
ximals 
  and Alliance.  The other one is the Blackfortress, the base a lar=
ge faction 
  of Predacons.  There are three Predacon leaders there, and i =
think we might 
  be able to work out an Alliance with them. 
  ~~~~~ 
  Wh=
eeljack: I'd say a sloping, hill-type shape.(Thanks for the idea Zardus!) 
=
  ~~~~~ 
  Vulois: Yes, lets. I think we should first go to the Maximals, f=
or they will 
  be the most likely to cooperate.  Even so, there are a lot =
of warlike 
  Maximals, so be ready for anything. 
  ::he walks out of his =
cave and starts flying to the CF:: 
  ~~~~~ 
  ::Time Warp was releived tha=
t they were friends, until he heard what they 
  said about Infectra:: 
  T=
ime Warp: Infectra?! In the Alliance?! I didnt know her very well, but she =

  definately wasnt Alliance material!  Lets get out of here Airbomber, the=
se 
  guys are fools.
